item.title: VanEck Merk Gold Trust 10-K
item.description: VanEck Merk Gold Trust, which is in the [6221] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 13, 2022 had 22071 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: gold - 901 instances trust - 739 instances shares - 388 instances sponsor - 309 instances may - 272 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
